column4: Hi. Is anyone else having troubles with firefox after that last update?

Guess not. after the most recent update (just updated) my firefox has been sketchy. Not loading bookmarks or any preferences. I can still see them if I type the beginning of one of my book marks into the address bar, but can't see them in my bookmark tab. Still can travel the web. Anyone know what happened?
Try Right-Click on the navigation bar -->Customize... --> Restore Default Set.  I think your GUI went out of wacky.  If that doesn't work, then I don't know.
It worked for a second, then firefox crashed
Also, whenever I try to use foxmarks (or x marks now I guess) it closes.
Hmm.  Well, I solved your issue.  And now you have a new issue. :-\
It went back the way it was
I tried to go into my addon menu and firefox closed.
same problem with the bookmarks. The add on isn't here though
Closed when I tried to go into my addons
Sounds like Foxmark b0rked your Firefox.
Where is the bookmarks folder so I can get my bookmarks before I clean install firefox?
Try search somewhere in /home/Rip/.mozilla/    --->  However, I suggest you to rename /home/Rip/.mozilla_backup/ --> This way, you can start Firefox with a clean config file.
I'm totally out of hd space. Think that might be my problem? haha
I wouldn't know how Firefox manage with no room.  Could be.  Would be.  Should be.
